import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { Monday } from '../monday'; import { MondayService } from '../monday.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-monday-list', templateUrl: './monday-list.component.html', styleUrls: ['./monday-list.component.css'] }) export class MondayListComponent implements OnInit { pageTitle = 'Monday List'; mondays: Monday[] = []; constructor(private mondayService: MondayService) { } ngOnInit(): void { this.getMondayData(); } getMondayData() { this.mondayService.getMondays() .subscribe( data => { this.mondays = data; }) } }
